short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your browser with password protection, auto-lock, and privacy controls. Perfect for shared computers and public spaces.

üõ°Ô∏è Advanced Security

‚ö° Smart Automation
